summary: Beverly Jackson was an employee of the U.S. House of Representatives Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA), also referred to as the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCA). Payroll and certification reports from 1978 and 1979 document her employment, including her position, annual salary, and earnings for specific pay periods between May and November 1978. The specific details of her role within the committee are not specified in the available documents.
